rooms.description: A welcoming entry with a foyer that leads into the main living space.
An open-plan area combining modern aesthetics with ample natural lighting and Vastu-aligned south-eastern placement for wealth and creativity.
A dedicated work space designed to foster productivity; placed in a quiet zone that adheres to Vastu principles to enhance concentration and energy flow.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout and integration of dining area; positioned ideally for auspicious energy as per Vastu guidelines.
A spacious bedroom featuring ample storage and natural light, aligned along the east for positive energy and calm mornings.
Well-designed bathroom with a focus on functionality; placed in a corner to maintain privacy and flow of energy.
Multi-purpose room serving as an extra bedroom or study area, designed for flexibility while adhering to Vastu practices by orientating it towards the north.

openings.location: Front of the building, facing east as per Vastu guidelines.
Southwest corner of Living & Dining area for optimal daylight and ventilation.
From Lobby to Home Office for privacy and seamless movement.

data.vastu_considerations: Rooms are positioned with emphasis on directional alignments: entrance east, living area south-east, home office in a quiet zone; kitchen in the southeast to encourage abundance; bedroom oriented east for calm energy and positive mornings.
data.notes: The design integrates modern aesthetics with traditional Vastu principles. Adjustments may be needed based on specific site conditions, local building norms, and personal preferences.
